CSS
copy 

.section{ float : left; width : 100%; clear : both; }
.container{ 
    margin : 0 auto; 
    width : 100%; min-width : 300px; max-width : 1200px; 
    padding : 0 10px; 
    box-sizing : border-box; position : relative; 
}
.container-elastic{ width : 100%; padding : 0 10px; position : relative; }

/* 1.1 Горизонтальное структурирование (Представление/отображение) */
.row{ margin-left : -10px; margin-right : -10px; }
.row-line{ margin-left : -10px; margin-right : -10px;  font-size: 0;  }
.row-flexbox{ display : flex;  } 
.row-table{ margin-left : -10px; margin-right : -10px; }
/* 1.1.1 block */
.row>div{ float : left; }

.row.row-reverse>div{ float : right; }
/* 1.1.2 inline-block  */
.row-line>div{ float : none; display : inline-block;}

.row-line.middle>div{ vertical-align : middle;  }
.row-line.top>div{ vertical-align : top; }
.row-line.bottom>div{ vertical-align : bottom; }
.row-line.baseline>div{ vertical-align : baseline; }

.row-line.row-reverse{ direction : rtl; }
.row-line.row-reverse>div{ direction : ltr; }
/* 1.1.3 flex */
.row-flexbox{ display : flex; margin-left : -10px; margin-right : -10px; } 

.row-flexbox.middle{ align-items : center; }
.row-flexbox.top{ align-items : flex-start; }
.row-flexbox.bottom{ align-items : flex-end; }
.row-flexbox.baseline{ align-items : baseline; }
.row-flexbox.stretch{ align-items : stretch; }

.row-flexbox.row-reverse{
    flex-direction : row-reverse;
}
.row-flexbox.column-reverse{
    flex-direction : column-reverse;
}

/* 1.1.4 table */
.row-table{ //display : table; width : 100%; }

.row-table>div{ display : table-cell; }

.row-table.middle>div{ vertical-align : middle; }
.row-table.top>div{ vertical-align : top; }
.row-table.bottom>div{ vertical-align : bottom; }
.row-table.baseline>div{ vertical-align : baseline; }

SCSS
copy 

// Input data:
$columns: 12;
$columns_gap: 10;
$container_width: 1200;

$column_name: 'ds_';

$devices: ( 
    mv_: 320,
    mh_: 480,
    tb_: 768,
    ds_: 1024,
    hd_: 1200
);

/* 1. Structure elements */

.section{
    width: 100%;
    float: left; width: 100%; clear: both;
}
.container{    
    max-width: $container_width+px;
    padding-left: $columns_gap+px;
    padding-right: $columns_gap+px;
    margin: 0 auto; box-sizing: border-box;    position: relative;
}
.row{
    margin-left: -$columns_gap+px;
    margin-right: -$columns_gap+px;
}
.row-line{
    margin-left: -$columns_gap+px;
    margin-right: -$columns_gap+px; 
    font-size: 0; 
}
.row-flex{
    display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin-left: -$columns_gap+px;
    margin-right: -$columns_gap+px;    
}
